## MaterialOptions.fog property

`RawShaderMaterial` instances need to know about the fog at instantiation in order to avoid recompiling them manually later (ThreeJS does not update fog for `RawShaderMaterial`<!-- -->s).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fog?: boolean;
```
